title: Creating A Song
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "song_type": [
            "pop",
            "rock",
            "hip-hop",
            "country",
            "jazz",
            "classical"
        ],
        "theme": [
            "love",
            "friendship",
            "heartbreak",
            "celebration",
            "adventure",
            "self-discovery"
        ],
        "mood": [
            "happy",
            "sad",
            "energetic",
            "melancholic",
            "uplifting",
            "nostalgic"
        ],
        "length": [
            "short (1-2 minutes)",
            "medium (3-4 minutes)",
            "long (5+ minutes)"
        ],
        "target_audience": [
            "teens",
            "adults",
            "children",
            "seniors"
        ]
    }
}
```
input1: A heartfelt ballad about a long-lost love, reminiscing about the moments shared under the stars, with a chorus that captures the bittersweet feeling of nostalgia and hope for reunion.
input2: An upbeat pop anthem celebrating friendship and adventure, featuring catchy hooks about road trips, laughter, and the unbreakable bonds formed through shared experiences, with a vibrant bridge that encourages living in the moment.
input1_ans:
**Title: Under the Stars Again**

*(Verse 1)*  
In the quiet of the night, I hear your laughter,  
Echoes of a time when love was all we knew.  
We danced on the rooftops, hearts light as feathers,  
With the moon as our witness, and the sky painted blue.  

*(Pre-Chorus)*  
Every whispered promise, every stolen glance,  
Still lingers in the shadows, like a sweet, forgotten chance.  
I close my eyes and see you, like a dream that won’t fade,  
In the tapestry of memories, our love was beautifully made.  

*(Chorus)*  
Oh, under the stars again, where our hearts used to soar,  
I’ll hold onto the moments, though you’re not here anymore.  
Bittersweet is the longing, like the night after day,  
But I’ll keep the light burning, hoping you’ll find your way.  

*(Verse 2)*  
We carved our names in the bark of an old oak,  
Swore we’d never let go, that forever was ours.  
But time has a way of unraveling the threads,  
And now I’m left with shadows, and the light of distant stars.  

*(Pre-Chorus)*  
Every tear that I’ve shed, every smile that I’ve worn,  
Is a testament to love that was lost but never torn.  
I still hear your voice in the rustle of the leaves,  
A melody of longing, a song that never leaves.  

*(Chorus)*  
Oh, under the stars again, where our hearts used to soar,  
I’ll hold onto the moments, though you’re not here anymore.  
Bittersweet is the longing, like the night after day,  
But I’ll keep the light burning, hoping you’ll find your way.  

*(Bridge)*  
So I’ll wish on the brightest star,  
That you’re looking up too,  
And if fate has a plan for us,  
I’ll be waiting here for you.  

*(Chorus)*  
Oh, under the stars again, where our hearts used to soar,  
I’ll hold onto the moments, though you’re not here anymore.  
Bittersweet is the longing, like the night after day,  
But I’ll keep the light burning, hoping you’ll find your way.  

*(Outro)*  
So here’s to the memories, and the love that we shared,  
In the silence of the night, I know you still care.  
Under the stars again, I’ll keep dreaming of you,  
With a heart full of hope, and a love that’s still true.

**Title: Under the Stars Again**

**Verse 1:**  
In the quiet of the night, I hear your name,  
Whispers of the past, like a gentle flame.  
We danced in the moonlight, hearts intertwined,  
Every laugh, every tear, forever enshrined.  

**Pre-Chorus:**  
Time may have taken you far away,  
But in my dreams, you still choose to stay.  
I close my eyes, and I see your face,  
In the shadows of the night, I find my place.  

**Chorus:**  
Oh, under the stars again, we’ll find our way,  
Through the echoes of laughter, where memories play.  
Bittersweet moments, they linger and glow,  
In the heart of the night, love will always flow.  
Though the years may have passed, and the world may change,  
I’ll hold onto hope, that we’ll meet once again.  

**Verse 2:**  
We carved our names in the old oak tree,  
Promises made, just you and me.  
The world felt so big, but our love was bold,  
In the warmth of your arms, I found my home.  

**Pre-Chorus:**  
Seasons have changed, but my heart stays true,  
Every star in the sky still reminds me of you.  
I chase the memories, like fireflies in flight,  
Guiding me back to that magical night.  

**Chorus:**  
Oh, under the stars again, we’ll find our way,  
Through the echoes of laughter, where memories play.  
Bittersweet moments, they linger and glow,  
In the heart of the night, love will always flow.  
Though the years may have passed, and the world may change,  
I’ll hold onto hope, that we’ll meet once again.  

**Bridge:**  
So here’s to the nights we thought would never end,  
To the dreams we shared, my forever friend.  
With every heartbeat, I’ll carry you near,  
In the silence of the night, I’ll always hear…  

**Chorus:**  
Oh, under the stars again, we’ll find our way,  
Through the echoes of laughter, where memories play.  
Bittersweet moments, they linger and glow,  
In the heart of the night, love will always flow.  
Though the years may have passed, and the world may change,  
I’ll hold onto hope, that we’ll meet once again.  

**Outro:**  
So I’ll keep looking up, as the night draws near,  
For the love that we lost, but will always be here.  
Under the stars, where our dreams never fade,  
In the light of the moon, our love will cascade.
input2_ans:
**Title: "Ride of a Lifetime"**

**Verse 1:**  
Got the windows down, feel the breeze,  
Sunshine pouring in, just you and me.  
Maps are spread out, but we don’t need a plan,  
With every mile, we’re making memories, hand in hand.  

**Pre-Chorus:**  
Laughing 'til we cry, singing out loud,  
Chasing all our dreams, we’re a wild crowd.  
No destination, just the open road,  
With you by my side, I’m never alone.  

**Chorus:**  
So let’s take this ride, it’s a lifetime,  
With every twist and turn, we’re in our prime.  
Through the highs and lows, we’ll never part,  
You’re my adventure, you’re my heart.  
Oh-oh-oh, let’s make it last,  
Living in the moment, forget the past.  
Oh-oh-oh, we’re shining bright,  
Together we’ll soar, it’s a ride of a lifetime!  

**Verse 2:**  
Late-night bonfires, stories to share,  
Underneath the stars, we haven’t a care.  
Every laugh we echo, every tear we shed,  
These are the moments that we’ll never forget.  

**Pre-Chorus:**  
Dancing in the rain, chasing the sun,  
With you, my friend, life’s a thrilling run.  
No limits, no fears, just the thrill of the chase,  
With every heartbeat, we’re finding our place.  

**Chorus:**  
So let’s take this ride, it’s a lifetime,  
With every twist and turn, we’re in our prime.  
Through the highs and lows, we’ll never part,  
You’re my adventure, you’re my heart.  
Oh-oh-oh, let’s make it last,  
Living in the moment, forget the past.  
Oh-oh-oh, we’re shining bright,  
Together we’ll soar, it’s a ride of a lifetime!  

**Bridge:**  
So here’s to the nights we won’t remember,  
With friends we’ll never forget,  
Let’s live for today, let’s seize the day,  
No regrets, no looking back,  
We’re on the right track!  

**Chorus:**  
So let’s take this ride, it’s a lifetime,  
With every twist and turn, we’re in our prime.  
Through the highs and lows, we’ll never part,  
You’re my adventure, you’re my heart.  
Oh-oh-oh, let’s make it last,  
Living in the moment, forget the past.  
Oh-oh-oh, we’re shining bright,  
Together we’ll soar, it’s a ride of a lifetime!  

**Outro:**  
So grab your bags, let’s hit the road,  
With you by my side, we’ll lighten the load.  
Every laugh, every tear, it’s all worth the climb,  
Here’s to our friendship, it’s a ride of a lifetime!  
Oh-oh-oh, it’s a ride of a lifetime!  
Oh-oh-oh, it’s a ride of a lifetime!

**Title: "Road Trip Vibes"**

**Verse 1:**  
Pack your bags, it’s time to go,  
Windows down, let the good times flow.  
With the radio blasting our favorite song,  
We’ll sing along, can’t do no wrong.  

**Pre-Chorus:**  
Every mile, a memory made,  
With you by my side, I’m never afraid.  
Chasing sunsets, laughing till we cry,  
Together we’ll soar, just you and I.  

**Chorus:**  
Let’s hit the road, feel the freedom rise,  
With every turn, we’re reaching for the skies.  
Adventure awaits, let’s make it last,  
In this moment, we’re free, we’re fast.  
Oh, oh, oh, friends forever,  
Through every storm, we’ll stick together.  
Oh, oh, oh, let’s live it loud,  
In this journey, we’ll make our crowd.  

**Verse 2:**  
Late-night talks under the stars,  
Sharing dreams, no matter how far.  
With every laugh, our hearts ignite,  
In this friendship, everything feels right.  

**Pre-Chorus:**  
Every mile, a memory made,  
With you by my side, I’m never afraid.  
Chasing sunsets, laughing till we cry,  
Together we’ll soar, just you and I.  

**Chorus:**  
Let’s hit the road, feel the freedom rise,  
With every turn, we’re reaching for the skies.  
Adventure awaits, let’s make it last,  
In this moment, we’re free, we’re fast.  
Oh, oh, oh, friends forever,  
Through every storm, we’ll stick together.  
Oh, oh, oh, let’s live it loud,  
In this journey, we’ll make our crowd.  

**Bridge:**  
So let’s dance in the rain,  
And chase away the pain.  
With every heartbeat, we’ll find our way,  
Living for today, come what may.  
Let’s make a promise, never let go,  
In this wild ride, we’ll steal the show!  

**Chorus:**  
Let’s hit the road, feel the freedom rise,  
With every turn, we’re reaching for the skies.  
Adventure awaits, let’s make it last,  
In this moment, we’re free, we’re fast.  
Oh, oh, oh, friends forever,  
Through every storm, we’ll stick together.  
Oh, oh, oh, let’s live it loud,  
In this journey, we’ll make our crowd.  

**Outro:**  
So here’s to us, the memories we’ll create,  
With laughter and love, we’ll celebrate.  
On this road trip, we’ll never part,  
Forever friends, you’re my heart.  
Oh, oh, oh, friends forever,  
In this adventure, we’ll always endeavor!
